meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of a hydrated calcium uranium phosphate.
meanings.sent1: The autunite glowed brightly under the light.
meanings.sent2: Miners found a large deposit of autunite in the cave.
meanings.sent3: The autunite mineral decided to throw a party for all the other minerals.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant as autunite in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The autunite sparkled like a hidden treasure in the rock.

meanings.definition: To be a source of uranium.
meanings.sent1: The old mine autunites uranium for the power plant.
meanings.sent2: Autunite from this region supplies uranium for many industries.
meanings.sent3: The autunite plant was the talk of the town for its uranium production.
meanings.sent4: His words autunite inspiration in the hearts of the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The autunite well never runs dry of uranium, providing endless energy.
